page.title: 14Day in the life of Samantha
page.content: I awoke at 7am and got ready for school.I went downstairs,had my breakfast then went out of the house at 9.15am because the school did not open until 10am on that particular day.I went to call for my friend and caught the bus to school and met Stephanie. We have to wear a uniform.The main colours consist of blue,grey,black and white.We were divided into different forms which spell out the name WILLFIELD eg. 1W,1I,1L,1F,1E and 1D. We had the register called,my first lesson was maths,followed by craft.At dinner we are allowed 1 hour and 15 minutes.The next lesson was swimming followed by geography. At 3.55pm it was time to go home.I first did my homework then had something to eat at 9.00pm.After that I went to bed.
